required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Assess the Food Effect of K-877 in Healthy Adult Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open Label, Two-sequence, Two-period Crossover Study to Assess the Food Effect on the Pharmacokinetics of Single-Dose Administration of the To-Be-Marketed Formulation of K-877 in Healthy Adult Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: Study is to assess the effects of food on the Pharmacokinetics(PK) of single-dose administration of K-877 in healthy adult volunteers.

primary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose (within 1 hour before dosing and at pre-meal in case of fed condition) and at 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, and 24 hours after dosing on Days 1 and 4
pre-dose (within 1 hour before dosing and at pre-meal in case of fed condition) and at 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, and 24 hours after dosing on Days 1 and 4
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve from time 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (AUC0-t)

primary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose (within 1 hour before dosing and at pre-meal in case of fed condition) and at 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, and 24 hours after dosing on Days 1 and 4
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve from time 0 extrapolated to infinity (AUC0-inf)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose (within 1 hour before dosing and at pre-meal in case of fed condition) and at 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, and 24 hours after dosing on Days 1 and 4
secondary_outcome.description: Time to reach the observed maximum (peak) plasma concentration (Tmax)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose (within 1 hour before dosing and at pre-meal in case of fed condition) and at 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, and 24 hours after dosing on Days 1 and 4
secondary_outcome.description: Mean residence time from time 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (MRT0-t)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose (within 1 hour before dosing and at pre-meal in case of fed condition) and at 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, and 24 hours after dosing on Days 1 and 4
secondary_outcome.description: Mean residence time from time 0 extrapolated to infinity (MRT0-inf)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose (within 1 hour before dosing and at pre-meal in case of fed condition) and at 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, and 24 hours after dosing on Days 1 and 4
pre-dose (within 1 hour before dosing and at pre-meal in case of fed condition) and at 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, and 24 hours after dosing on Days 1 and 4
pre-dose (within 1 hour before dosing and at pre-meal in case of fed condition) and at 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, and 24 hours after dosing on Days 1 and 4
pre-dose (within 1 hour before dosing and at pre-meal in case of fed condition) and at 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, and 24 hours after dosing on Days 1 and 4

arm_group.description: Single dose of K-877 administered in a fasted condition on Day 1 (Treatment Period 1) and postprandially on Day 4 (Treatment Period 2)
Single dose of K-877 administered postprandially on Day 1 (Treatment Period 1) and in a fasted condition on Day 4 (Treatment Period 2)
